ai-tha-ap168:1.3_0: like the hero, leaving the road.
ai-tha-ap168:1.4_0: and making no desire for the great crowd,
ai-tha-ap168:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap168:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap168:3.4_0: as is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap168:4.1_0: allowable without leaves of any eon.
ai-tha-ap168:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
